17LA.F.summary: Lenta PLC, together with its subsidiaries, develops and operates hypermarket and supermarket stores. As of June 22, 2020, it operated 248 hypermarkets in 88 cities across Russia; and 133 supermarkets in Moscow and Saint Petersburg, as well as in Siberia, the Urals, and the Central region. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Saint Petersburg, Russia. Lenta PLC is a subsidiary of Severgroup LLC.

DSKY.ME.long_name: Public Joint Stock Company Detsky Mir
DSKY.ME.summary: Public Joint Stock Company Detsky Mir, a multi-format retailer, operates a chain of children's clothing and goods retail stores. The company offers toys and games, products for newborns, apparel and footwear, art and craft sets, recreational goods, car seats, furniture, and stationery, as well as pet goods. As of August 31, 2020, it operated through a network of 784 Detsky Mir stores located in 303 cities in Russia, Kazakhstan, and Belarus; 5 Detmir.ru stores; and 27 early learning centers, 3 ABC, and 11 Zoozavr stores. The company was founded in 1947 and is based in Moscow, Russia.
